name: Science of Seduction
description:
This was made in less than 72 hours for the Krass-N.G. game jam. There will likely be bugs, and balancing issues. If you find any, please post a comment with as much information as possible so I can recreate, and fix them.

Aim

Seduce the DNA across from you in 60 seconds.

How to Play

Your Seduction Meter is on your top left, and the Timer is on your top right.

Each DNA has a random personality (Cute, Crude, Witty, and Intelligent). They really like it if you choose a message that fits their personality, and hate it if you pick one that conflicts.

Use the 1-3 buttons at the top of your keyboard to select one of the messages at the top of your screen, and pay attention to their response to guide future choices.
